All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Archer
Is a character type in the world, the player chooses this type, can pick up fleche , potionSoin and Epinard, can not pick up Epee.
Combattant
The class that implements this interface has the combat property.
Creature
is an abstract class that is the parent class of all creatures in the world and defines in it the properties that all creatures have.
Deplacable
Classes that implement this interface have the random move property.
ElementDeJeu
Represents all elements in the world, and all elements in the world are subclasses of this class.
Epee
is an element of the world, randomly generated by the system, and can only be picked up by the Guerrier and can be used by the player to attack.
Epinard
Is an element in the world, randomly generated by the system.
Fleche
Is an element in the world, randomly generated by the system.
Guerrier
It is an element of the world that can be selected by the player and will also be automatically generated by the system.
Joueur
Represents the player in the world, able to move, attack, use medicine, etc.
Lapin
Is an element in the world, randomly generated by the system.
Loup
Is an element in the world, randomly generated by the system.
Monstre
The class Monstre represents the monsters of the world, a class that inherits from the Creature class.
MyPanel
The interface used to display the game, which is convenient for the user to play.
Nourriture
Represents all nourriture in the world and has the ability to increase a player's ability in a certain area.
NuageToxique
Is an element in the world, randomly generated by the system.
Objet
Represents all items in the world with a specific function.
Paysan
Is an element in the world, randomly generated by the system.
Personnage
The class Personnage represents a human being in the world Under this Superclass, we can find subclasses such as warrior, archer, etc.
Point2D
Represents a position in the world.
PotionSoin
Is an object in the world, randomly generated by the system.
TestPoint2D
Test the functionality of the Point2D class for completeness.
TestWoE
Test if the World Me function is working properly.
Utilisable
Classes that inherit from this interface indicate that they can be used by players.
World
The class World represents a world that contains different roles like Personnage(Archer,Paysan, Guerrier) and Monstre(Lapin, Loup), the role Personnage can attack Monstre through the method combattre, it can also restore vitality through the use of PationSoin.
